title: build: nacl build broken on dev.cc branch
body:
The new Go-based dist and nacl don't work together yet.

```
bradfitz@laptop src$ GOROOT_BOOTSTRAP=/Users/bradfitz/prevgo/go1.4 GOOS=nacl GOARCH=amd64p32 ./make.bash 
##### Building Go bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist
./make.bash: line 127: ./cmd/dist/dist: cannot execute binary file

bradfitz@laptop src$ file cmd/dist/dist 
cmd/dist/dist: ELF 64-bit LSB executable, x86-64, version 1 (SYSV), statically linked, not stripped

bradfitz@laptop src$ uname -a
Darwin bradfitz-macbookpro.roam.corp.google.com 13.4.0 Darwin Kernel Version 13.4.0: Sun Aug 17 19:50:11 PDT 2014; root:xnu-2422.115.4~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
```

/cc @minux
